descriptionNullable:
_____
# Kyiv, Ukraine Weather Statistics
### Precipitation, Snow Depth, Temperature Variations
By Valeriy [[source]](https://data.world/analyst-2018)
_____

### About this dataset
> This dataset provides a fascinating look at the weather statistics of Kyiv, Ukraine for the past 136 years. It contains detailed information about precipitation, snow depth, average temperature, maximum temperature, and minimum temperature from monthly data points. Dive into this dataset to gain insights into the climatic conditions of this region and see how it has changed over time. Furthermore, have a look and compare different weather properties across various months of each year to gain valuable knowledge about the region's climate with regards to its geography and topography

### More Datasets
> For more datasets, click [here](https://www.kaggle.com/thedevastator/datasets).

### Featured Notebooks
> - 🚨 **Your notebook can be here!** 🚨! 

### How to use the dataset
> In this dataset, users can access weather information for Kyiv, Ukraine. This data includes precipitation amounts, average and minimum/maximum temperatures, snow depths, and various monthly and yearly measurements. By utilizing this data, users can get a comprehensive overview of Kyiv's climate history over the last century and even make comparisons between different years or decades.
> 

### Research Ideas
> - Analyzing long-term climate patterns for Kyiv using the average temperature, maximum and minimum temperatures, as well as precipitation data. This could help inform policies to deal with potential future impacts of climate change in the city. 
> - Studying correlations between snowfall and other weather variables over time in order to create more effective snow management strategies in Kyiv during winter months. 
> - Mapping precipitation, temperature, and other weather conditions on a timeline to visualize how significant environmental changes have taken place in Kyiv since 1881

### Acknowledgements
> If you use this dataset in your research, please credit the original authors.
> [Data Source](https://data.world/analyst-2018)
> 
>


### License
> 
> 
> See the dataset description for more information.

### Columns

**File: weather_kyiv.csv**
| Column name   | Description                 |
|:--------------|:----------------------------|
| **PRCP**      | Precipitation (Float)       |
| **SNWD**      | Snow Depth (Float)          |
| **TAVG**      | Average Temperature (Float) |
| **TMAX**      | Maximum Temperature (Float) |
| **TMIN**      | Minimum Temperature (Float) |
| **century**   | Century (Integer)           |
| **date**      | Date (String)               |
| **month**     | Month (String)              |
| **month_no**  | Month Number (Integer)      |
| **year**      | Year (Integer)              |

### Acknowledgements
> If you use this dataset in your research, please credit the original authors.
> If you use this dataset in your research, please credit [Valeriy](https://data.world/analyst-2018).
